title: League featured glitch
body:
when ever I start up league of legends it works fine except for the featured page its black and when I hover over its this 

Secret Agent Xin Zhao

975

-28%
Headhunter Akali

975

Player Behaviour FAQ

Learn more about the Player Behaviour systems!

Champion Mastery hits PBE

With Champion Mastery, you get points, ranks, and rewards for playing the champs you love.

RECAP: The night of upsets


The Featured Game Modes of 2014


Connection Lost
Refresh
Searching For Matches ...
Previous
Next

This from me copying what it says? any one have any idea what's causing this  also  when I don't touch the page its black but when I scroll over it its grey with basic text

replies.body: Could you provide a screenshot of this?

Try the following: Go into your Internet Options and reset all possible settings back to their defaults. Try opening League again. If it's still whacky, go back into Internet Options and change the security level from Medium to Medium-Low.
How did it turn out? Is it loading correctly?

Have you tried clearing the internet cache and flushing your DNS?

[Here's a page on how to use an alternative DNS.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#wq4)
